longitude.hint: The long lines of longitude stretch from pole to pole.

beached.example: The ship was beached after the storm.

remotely.example: She works remotely from her home.

correlate.example: Scientists often correlate data from different studies.

singularity.example: The concept of a black hole involves a singularity at its center.

alpha point.example: The alpha point of the project was its initial planning phase.

glare.example: The glare from the sun was blinding.

return.example: He will return home next week.

interim.example: In the interim period, the company will appoint an interim CEO.

gulls.example: The gulls were circling above the fishing boat.

shun.example: He tends to shun large crowds.

depletion.example: The depletion of natural resources is a major concern.

fishing stock.example: The government implemented measures to protect fishing stocks.

depart.example: The train will depart at 10 AM. (기차는 오전 10시에 떠납니다.)

herd.example: A herd of cows grazed in the field. (소 무리가 들판에서 풀을 뜯고 있었다.)

sickly.example: The sickly child needed constant care. (그 병약한 아이는 지속적인 보살핌이 필요했다.)

populate.example: Many species populate the rainforest. (많은 종들이 열대우림에 거주한다.)

shepherds.example: Shepherds lead their flocks to the pastures. (목자들은 그들의 양 떼를 목초지로 이끈다.)

overall.example: Overall, the project was a success. (전반적으로, 그 프로젝트는 성공적이었다.)

stumble.example: He stumbled over a rock and fell. (그는 바위에 발을 헛디뎌 넘어졌다.)

precipices.example: The climber stood on the edge of the precipice. (등산객은 절벽 끝에 서 있었다.)

plummeting.example: The temperatures are plummeting this winter. (올겨울 기온이 급락하고 있다.)

ashore.example: The shipwrecked sailors swam ashore. (난파된 선원들이 해안으로 헤엄쳐 갔다.)

ankles.example: She twisted her ankle while running. (그녀는 달리던 중 발목을 삐었다.)

as though.example: He acted as though nothing had happened. (그는 마치 아무 일도 없었던 것처럼 행동했다.)

conspired.example: They conspired to overthrow the government. (그들은 정부를 전복하려 음모를 꾸몄다.)

shipwreck.example: They found treasure in a shipwreck. (그들은 난파선에서 보물을 발견했다.)

listless.example: The patient felt listless after the surgery. (환자는 수술 후 무기력함을 느꼈다.)

only then.example: Only then did she realize her mistake. (그때서야 그녀는 자신의 실수를 깨달았다.)
